title: Clou & MOD free typeface by Fontfabric
content:
Hello all! I'm happy to introduce my last two typefaces.  
One of them - MOD, is available for free download from [HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173351/http:/fontfabric.com/?p=396).  
The fonts are great for tee designs, posters, logos, head titles etc.  
Enjoy!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173351im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clou01_4521.gif)
  
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
Clou™ full preview & design from [HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173351/http:/fontfabric.com/?p=462)  
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173351im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mod002_4096.jpg)
